DeathSteel::

He had been left alone for a while now. He felt sure that he wasn't 
trusted, but was being observed by other means. He walked around 
untill he found the control bridge. He stood just inside the doorway, 
looking at the panels. He was trying to figure out which ones 
operated the shield and protection systems. He soon had in his sights 
what he was looking for. Now he had to wait. Untill the attack was 
on, he didn't want to drop thier shields too quickly. He stood 
against the wall and watched and waited.
